item.description:
Guest speaker on atheism :

'Reason, God, Contradiction, and Proving a Negative

In Objectivism: The Philosophy of Ayn Rand Peikoff wrote that "one can disprove a claim or 'prove a negative' only by demonstrating that the claim contradicts established knowledge; i.e., only by relating the claim to a positive cognitive context, when this is available."
I will explore the implications of Peikoff's statement for the claim that God exists.'
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Free State Project Tshirt

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Atheism - Reason, God, Contradiction, and Proving a Negative
